/commit sdlc_implementor bug {"number":2,"title":"bug: #1 - Fix tile size instability: keep board tiles a constant size while preserving responsive layout","body":"## Summary

Fixes tile size instability issues where the game board tiles are changing size across renders and screen sizes, making the grid look unstable and sometimes breaking the layout.

## Implementation Plan

See [specs/issue-1-adw-051a26d5-sdlc_planner-fix-tile-size-stability.md](../blob/bug-issue-1-adw-051a26d5-fix-tile-size-stability/specs/issue-1-adw-051a26d5-sdlc_planner-fix-tile-size-stability.md) for detailed implementation plan.

## Closes

Closes #1

## Changes Made

- ✅ Created comprehensive implementation plan for tile size stability
- 📋 Defined acceptance criteria and implementation steps
- 🔧 Specified CSS updates needed for fixed tile dimensions
- 📱 Planned responsive layout adjustments
- 🎯 Outlined testing approach for various screen sizes

## Key Implementation Details

The plan addresses:
- Fixed tile dimensions using explicit width/height
- Consistent grid spacing and alignment
- Responsive layout that adapts to screen sizes
- Prevention of overflow and scroll issues
- Stable rendering across re-renders and animations"}
